scripts.docker_compose_up: docker network create traefik-proxy-network || true && docker-compose up
scripts.docker_rebuild: npm run docker_compose_pull && npm run docker_compose_build && npm run docker_compose_kill && npm run docker_compose_down && npm run docker_compose_up
scripts.gitUpdate: git pull && git add . && git commit -m "update tls-challenge-tryout," && git push
